structure.unit: STATE LIBRARIES -- LIBRARIANS -- STATE ARCHIVES AND RECORDS

law.catch_line: Notification of provisions of KRS 171.830 to 171.849 to owner-lender by museum.
law.text: No later than forty-five (45) days after a museum receives a loan of property, the museum shall mail the provisions of KRS 171.830 to 171.849 to the owner, by certified mail, return receipt requested.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 368, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
